tool.name: PIPE-T
tool.description: A tool for analyzing RTqPCR expression data
tool.command:
#for $input in $dp.list_files ln -sf '$input' '$__tool_directory__/Symlink/${input.element_identifier}'; #end for
#if str( $dn.condNorm.normMethod ) == "deltaCt": #if str( $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format ) == "userdefined": #if str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "mestdagh" or str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "mean" or str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "median" or str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "cubic": #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "ttest": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.normalizers" $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $de.condDEA.alternative $de.condDEA.paired $de.condDEA.replicates $de.condDEA.sort $de.condDEA.stringent $de.condDEA.padjust $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "wtest": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.normalizers" $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $de.condDEA.alternative $de.condDEA.paired $de.condDEA.replicates $de.condDEA.sort $de.condDEA.stringent $de.condDEA.padjust $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "rp": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.normalizers" $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "none": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.normalizers" $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #end if
#if str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "knn": #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "ttest": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.normalizers" $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $df.condImpute.k $df.condImpute.maxp $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $de.condDEA.alternative $de.condDEA.paired $de.condDEA.replicates $de.condDEA.sort $de.condDEA.stringent $de.condDEA.padjust $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "wtest": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.normalizers" $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $df.condImpute.k $df.condImpute.maxp $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $de.condDEA.alternative $de.condDEA.paired $de.condDEA.replicates $de.condDEA.sort $de.condDEA.stringent $de.condDEA.padjust $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "rp": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.normalizers" $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $df.condImpute.k $df.condImpute.maxp $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "none": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.normalizers" $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $df.condImpute.k $df.condImpute.maxp $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #end if #end if #if str( $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format ) == "genorm": #if str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "mestdagh" or str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "mean" or str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "median" or str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "cubic": #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "ttest": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.minhkgenorm $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $de.condDEA.alternative $de.condDEA.paired $de.condDEA.replicates $de.condDEA.sort $de.condDEA.stringent $de.condDEA.padjust $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "wtest": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.minhkgenorm $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $de.condDEA.alternative $de.condDEA.paired $de.condDEA.replicates $de.condDEA.sort $de.condDEA.stringent $de.condDEA.padjust $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "rp": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.minhkgenorm $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "none": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.minhkgenorm $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #end if
#if str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "knn": #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "ttest": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.minhkgenorm $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $df.condImpute.k $df.condImpute.maxp $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $de.condDEA.alternative $de.condDEA.paired $de.condDEA.replicates $de.condDEA.sort $de.condDEA.stringent $de.condDEA.padjust $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "wtest": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.minhkgenorm $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $df.condImpute.k $df.condImpute.maxp $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $de.condDEA.alternative $de.condDEA.paired $de.condDEA.replicates $de.condDEA.sort $de.condDEA.stringent $de.condDEA.padjust $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "rp": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.minhkgenorm $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $df.condImpute.k $df.condImpute.maxp $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "none": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.minhkgenorm $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $df.condImpute.k $df.condImpute.maxp $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #end if #end if #if str( $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format ) == "normfinder": #if str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "mestdagh" or str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "mean" or str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "median" or str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "cubic": #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "ttest": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.minhknormfinder $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $de.condDEA.alternative $de.condDEA.paired $de.condDEA.replicates $de.condDEA.sort $de.condDEA.stringent $de.condDEA.padjust $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "wtest": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.minhknormfinder $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $de.condDEA.alternative $de.condDEA.paired $de.condDEA.replicates $de.condDEA.sort $de.condDEA.stringent $de.condDEA.padjust $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "none": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.minhknormfinder $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #end if
#if str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "knn": #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "ttest": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.minhknormfinder $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $df.condImpute.k $df.condImpute.maxp $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $de.condDEA.alternative $de.condDEA.paired $de.condDEA.replicates $de.condDEA.sort $de.condDEA.stringent $de.condDEA.padjust $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "rp": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.minhknormfinder $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $df.condImpute.k $df.condImpute.maxp $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "none": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod "$dn.condNorm.deltamethod.format" $dn.condNorm.deltamethod.minhknormfinder $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $df.condImpute.k $df.condImpute.maxp $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #end if #end if
#else #if str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "mestdagh" or str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "mean" or str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "median" or str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "cubic": #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "ttest": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $de.condDEA.alternative $de.condDEA.paired $de.condDEA.replicates $de.condDEA.sort $de.condDEA.stringent $de.condDEA.padjust $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "wtest": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $de.condDEA.alternative $de.condDEA.paired $de.condDEA.replicates $de.condDEA.sort $de.condDEA.stringent $de.condDEA.padjust $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "rp": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "none": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #end if
#if str( $df.condImpute.format ) == "knn": #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "ttest": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $df.condImpute.k $df.condImpute.maxp $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $de.condDEA.alternative $de.condDEA.paired $de.condDEA.replicates $de.condDEA.sort $de.condDEA.stringent $de.condDEA.padjust $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "wtest": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $df.condImpute.k $df.condImpute.maxp $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $de.condDEA.alternative $de.condDEA.paired $de.condDEA.replicates $de.condDEA.sort $de.condDEA.stringent $de.condDEA.padjust $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "rp": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $df.condImpute.k $df.condImpute.maxp $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #if str( $de.condDEA.method ) == "none": Rscript $__tool_directory__/pipe-t.R $dp.files "$dp.formatFile" $dp.n $galaxy_output1 "$__tool_directory__/Symlink" $dc.Ctmin $dc.Ctmax $dc.flag $galaxy_output2 $dn.condNorm.normMethod $galaxy_output3 $galaxy_output4 $df.percent $galaxy_output5 $df.condImpute.format $df.condImpute.k $df.condImpute.maxp $galaxy_output6 $de.condDEA.method $galaxy_output7 "$df.filtname"; #end if #end if #end if

param.name: list_files
param.label: Select a collection list from the history tab
param.help: Collection should be of category List.

param.name: files
param.label: Select one of the files from the history tab
param.help: File should contains only the columns: sampleName and Treatment.

param.name: formatFile
param.label: Select one of the file formats from the list below.

param.name: n
param.label: Type the number of transcripts in your file

param.name: Ctmin
param.label: Set up a minimum Ct value
param.help: Any Ct below your selected value will be labelled as Unreliable.

param.name: Ctmax
param.label: Set up a maximum Ct value
param.help: Any Ct above your selected value will be labelled as Unreliable.

param.name: flag
param.label: Select TRUE if you want that PIPE-T assigns category 'Unreliable' on the basis of FAILURE flag
param.help: Data in qPCRset objects will have feature categories (Unreliable, Undetermined) assigned to them based on different Ct criteria.

param.name: normMethod
param.label: Select one of the normalization methods from the list below.
param.help: Normalization is important to reduce technical variability in the data.

param.name: format
param.label: Select one of the methods from the list below for selecting normalizers.

param.name: normalizers
param.label: Type a comma separated list of housekeeping transcripts that will be used as normalizers.

param.name: minhkgenorm
param.label: Type the minimum number of housekeeping transcripts that will be considered by geNorm method.

param.name: minhknormfinder
param.label: Type the minimum number of housekeeping transcripts that will be considered by NormFinder method.

param.name: percent
param.label: Set up a percentage of NAs.
param.help: Transcripts with more than the specified percentage of NAs across all samples will be removed.

param.name: filtname
param.label: Type a comma separeted list of transcript identifiers to filter out
param.help: Transcript identifiers specified in the List will be removed.

param.name: format
param.label: Select one of the imputation methods from the list below.

param.name: k
param.label: Type a number of neighbors to use in the KNN imputation method

param.name: maxp
param.label: Type the maximum number of imputed transcripts to use in the KNN method.
param.help: Larger numbers are divided by two-means clustering (recursively) prior to imputation.

param.name: method
param.label: Select one of the methods from the list below or NONE.
param.option: Two sample Wilcoxon test and fold change

param.name: alternative
param.label: Select one of the types of alternative hypothesis to assess significance.

param.name: paired
param.label: Select TRUE if you want a paired analysis.
param.help: Pairing of samples will follow the order of the sampleNames in the input file

param.name: replicates
param.label: Select TRUE if you have replicated transcripts in your data
param.help: If replicated transcripts are present in the data, the statistics will be calculated once for each replicated transcript, rather than separately.

param.name: sort
param.label: Select TRUE if you want that output file is sorted by increasing order of p-value?

param.name: stringent
param.label: Select TRUE to admit more stringent analysis.
param.help: If stringent is TRUE any unreliable or undetermined measurements among technical and biological replicates will result in the final result being Undetermined. If stringent is FALSE result will be OK unless at least half of the Ct values for a given gene are unreliable/undetermined.

param.name: padjust
param.label: Select one of the methods for adjusting pvalues in case of multiple hypothesis testing

param.name: alternative
param.label: Select one of the types of alternative hypothesis to assess significance.

param.name: paired
param.label: Select TRUE if you want a paired analysis.
param.help: Pairing of samples will follow the order of the sampleNames in the input file

param.name: replicates
param.label: Select TRUE if you have replicated transcripts in your data
param.help: If replicated transcripts are present in the data, the statistics will be calculated once for each replicated transcript, rather than separately.

param.name: sort
param.label: Select TRUE if you want that output file is sorted by increasing order of p-value?

param.name: stringent
param.label: Select TRUE to admit more stringent analysis.
param.help: If stringent is TRUE any unreliable or undetermined measurements among technical and biological replicates will result in the final result being Undetermined. If stringent is FALSE result will be OK unless at least half of the Ct values for a given gene are unreliable/undetermined.

param.name: padjust
param.label: Select one of the methods for adjusting pvalues in case of multiple hypothesis testing

tool.help: **What it does** INPUTS: This tool parses a list of RT-qPCR file and a file associating these files and one of two groups OUTPUTS: and returs 1) A txt file with the raw Ct data 2) A PNG file of a boxplot with the Ct data after data categorization for each sample 3) A txt file with normalized data 4) A PNG file with the Empirical cumulative distribution before and after data normalization 5) A PNG file of a boxplot with the normalzied data for each sample 6) A txt file with imputed data for each missing value 7) A txt file with the results of the differntial expression analyis
